article_title: 10 Ridiculous Lawsuits that Cost You Money
article_text: Tara Obenauer (Right), A Long Island woman, filed a claim to sue Nassau County in 2012 for $10 million saying it failed to supervise Police Officer Mike Tedesco with whom she was having an affair, and with whom she spent more than 100 nights while he was on duty.

og.title: 10 Ridiculous Lawsuits that Cost You Money

article_summary: Tara Obenauer (Right), A Long Island woman, filed a claim to sue Nassau County in 2012 for $10 million saying it failed to supervise Police Officer Mike Tedesco with whom she was having an affair, and with whom she spent more than 100 nights while he was on duty.
